DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Death Knight when:

  • Their Gargoyle is active and has less than 22 seconds remaining, or they have Army of the Dead with active Abomination or Army Ghouls nearing expiration.
  • Dark Transformation is active, and they do not use Gargoyle or Army of the Dead talents.
  • They cannot summon a Gargoyle soon, and the cooldown window aligns with your Power Infusion duration.
  • Facing 3 or more enemies while Dark Transformation is active or Death and Decay is affecting the area.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demonhunter when:

  • They have Metamorphosis active, as this amplifies their primary damage phase.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds to maximize final burst damage before the fight concludes.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • Their Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune is active to maximize burst damage during their primary cooldown window.
  • They are in a phase of high resource generation, such as during Eclipse transitions, to amplify their spellcasting efficiency.
  • They are preparing for a critical damage phase in an encounter, ensuring Power Infusion aligns with their pre-planned cooldown usage.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • Bloodlust/Heroism is active.
  • The Feral Druid has not selected the Berserk: Heart of the Lion talent.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • Their Dragonrage is active and Shattering Star is off cooldown, Shattering Star’s debuff is active on the target, or two or more enemies are present.
  • The fight duration is under 35 seconds remaining to ensure full effectiveness before combat ends.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • Trueshot is active and has more than 12 seconds remaining, ensuring alignment with their primary damage window.
  • Less than 13 seconds remain in the encounter, to maximize cooldown value before the fight ends.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • The Hunter has Coordinated Assault active.
  • The Hunter does not have Coordinated Assault and Spearhead is on cooldown.
  • The Hunter does not have access to either Coordinated Assault or Spearhead (uncommon in current builds).
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage is not using Spymaster's Web and has just cast Arcane Surge.
  • The Mage is using Spymaster's Web and has just completed Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Their Combustion cooldown is nearly ready to be used again, allowing alignment with their burst window.
  • Their active Combustion buff has more than 7 seconds remaining, extending their high-damage phase.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds, ensuring a final opportunity to maximize damage output.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • Their Icy Veins is active, maximizing burst damage during their primary cooldown window.
  • They are under the effects of Time Warp or another haste buff, amplifying their spellcasting speed and damage output.
  • They are in a high-damage phase (e.g., Frozen Orb or Glacial Spike setup) and do not already have the Power Infusion buff active.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • Their Xuen the White Tiger is active and Bloodlust is not active.
  • Their Xuen the White Tiger is active and Bloodlust is active, but Strike of the Windlord is still on cooldown.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • The Paladin has Avenging Wrath active.
  • The Paladin has Crusade active.
  • The target is affected by the Execution Sentence debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • They are in Voidform and do not have Power Infusion active
  • They have Dark Ascension active and do not have Power Infusion active
  • They have the Tier 20 4-piece set bonus and do not have Power Infusion active
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The target has Deathmark active (bleed effect is ticking), as this aligns with their major damage window and amplifies their burst potential.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • They activate Shadow Dance, their primary burst window enabling powerful stealth abilities.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • The Shaman is currently under the effect of Ascendance to amplify their burst damage phase.
  • The Shaman’s Ascendance cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining, ensuring it is not held for overlapping cooldowns.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • They activate Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds to amplify their burst window.
  • The fight’s final phase is in its last 20 seconds of a 120-second window to maximize last-minute damage.
  • Their major cooldowns are unavailable for at least 120 seconds, ensuring no overlap with future burst phases.
  • They lack talents for Ascendance, Feral Spirit, and Doom Winds, requiring standard cooldown alignment.
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • Their major cooldowns (e.g., Summon Soulkeeper, Darkglare, or racial abilities) are simultaneously active to maximize burst damage.
  • They are in a pre-planned burst window aligned with execute-phase abilities or encounter-specific mechanics.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • Their Demonic Tyrant summon is imminent, timed to extend the duration of their imps before they despawn.
  • They have just cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination to maximize the empowered minion uptime during the Tyrant’s summon.
  • They are at low Soul Shards (below 2) to ensure the Tyrant’s summon can still occur during the buff window.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • their Infernal (Summon Infernal) is currently active
  • they are not using the Summon Infernal talent
  • the fight will end soon but allows Power Infusion’s full duration before their next Infernal cooldown cycle
  • the fight will end before their next Infernal cooldown is ready by less than 15 seconds
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • Target has the Colossus Smash debuff and the fight lasts over 135 seconds (to allow another use),
  • They enter Execute Phase (target under 20% health) and have Avatar active,
  • Or if the fight will end within 25 seconds (final burst window).
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • Avatar has over 15 seconds remaining and the fight will last at least 135 more seconds.
  • The target is in Execute Phase (below 20% health) and Avatar is active.
  • The fight will end within 25 seconds, regardless of other conditions.
